episodes.title: Invasion
episodes.plot: American troops arrive in Britain and the Corps of Engineers building an airstrip on a Hastings farm is met with resentment.

episodes.title: Bad Blood
episodes.plot: Foyle investigates a mysterious disease affecting local farm animals and looks into the stabbing of a war hero.

episodes.title: Bleak Midwinter
episodes.plot: The death of a woman in a munitions factory becomes linked with the murder of Milner's estranged wife as he falls under suspicion and Foyle strives to clear his name.

episodes.title: Casualties of War
episodes.plot: Foyle has his hands full dealing with illegal gambling, sabotage, and his needy goddaughter who shows up on his doorstep with her traumatized son.
